response.original_title: The bible a book of fact and prophecy
response.overview: Amazing discoveries... The information displayed in this documentary is mind blowing and truly awe inspiring. I believe all who see this film will want to think hard about their beliefs, and consider their relationship with Jehovah! Lovers of truth should watch this documentary!
